title: Useful Google maps Tips
tags: Share your address on google maps
description:
Here are some useful Google maps tips and trick that will help in your next vacations or improve your daily commute. And next time you need to ask your friend for their exact location, you can share this video with them.  

[Video content]

#1  Share your location on google maps
#2  Share direction of Google maps
#3  See your Google location history
#4  Explore nearby places 
#5  Download google maps for offline

Also see http://receivetipstricks.com/offline-maps/

Google chrome extension, I am using - Be limitless
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/be-limitless/jdpnljppdhjpafeaokemhcggofohekbp?hl=en

I am using Impact Prelude by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution licence (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
